What causes Lymphomatoid papulosis ?,"What causes lymphomatoid papulosis? The cause of lymphomatoid papulosis is unknown, but it is associated with a proliferation of atypical T-cells. T-cells are specific white blood cells involved in immune responses.",GARD,Lymphomatoid papulosis
What are the treatments for Lymphomatoid papulosis ?,"How might lymphomatoid papulosis be treated? Localized mildly itchy skin
